content.raw:
While I know this is not strictly part of this PR, we should consider using descriptive names when possible. So e.g. we have things like:

```      
      on-created="_onMachineTypeCreated"
      on-deleted="_onMachineTypeDeleted"
      on-updated="_onMachineTypeUpdated"
```

but then we have `on-selecting-item="_onMachineTypeDialog"` which is not clear on what it does. I would suggest either naming the handler based on the event (e.g. `_onMachineTypeSelected`) or on the expected action (e.g. `_onMachineTypeDialogOpen` -although the "on" in this case feels weird-).
